name: CustomBot
author: Ofek Nakar

sections.description:
CustomBot is an easy way to use chatbot, no coding required,
you can create your bot conversation with in minutes with our
Drag&Drop Editor that give you varity of conversation options,
and an easy way to edit your own conversation,later all you need to is
copy the shortcode and paste in any page you want the chat to appear on.
and the most amazing thing is you can use the bot to answer in any language.

** you can save conversation in your email by ending the conversation with
** thank you question

Short Tutorial

  • Easy to install
  • Drag&Drop editor
  • Easy to edit/manage
  • Engage with users/clients
  • Increase your sells
  • Chat with visitors 24/7
  • Genrate more Leads

A brief Example

Installation:

  1. Activate
  2. Navigate to CustomBot Menu
  3. Custom you bot with our editor
  4. Copy & paste the short code on any page
  5. Chat ðŸ™‚

Hello,Hola,Shalom from MapleWP :), if there any need or support issue,you can reach us via
Website maple-wp.com

CustomBot ChatBot MapleWP
sections.faq:
What is ChatBot ?

Chatbot, is semi robot that you can edit to answer and talk
as you wish by your own script

How can i save conversations ?

if you want to save the conversations to your email,
end each script with thank you question.

How can i use CustomBot ?

you can start editing you bot script in our drag&drop editor,
and make a conversation that will help your product/demo/shop
to ncrease sales

Where i see the chat ?

first you need to navigate to custombot editor
then copy the shortcode under share and paste on any page

The plugin support RTL ?

Yes the plugin support rtl

The plugin has Pro version ?

yes, you can find more details here

Pro version
